select , m.person_id memberName, p.coupon_name couponName from
LEFT JOIN tb_coupon_product p ON g.coupon_code = p.coupon_code LEFT JOIN tb_ecom_member m ON g.member_id = m.member_id where g.data_stat = '0'
and g.order_id=#{orderId}
